amendment.description: Amendment limits the transferring of certain funds for the use of technical assistance under the Conservation Reserve or Wetland Reserve programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lucas (OK) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Lucas (OK).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lucas (OK) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
